fulltext:
WORK EXPERIENCES 
Control legal risks of contracts or/and agreements of the Company 
Draft contracts, commitments, agreements if necessary; 
Review all contracts received from owner departments; 
Manage contracts system,  standard contracts and number  
of contract system; update and making report as requested; 
Enter into negotiation with partners  and  suppliers  and  customers 
based on risks assessment of Legal Dept or requested by other Depts. 
Draft all official correspondence 
Draft and check legal point of view of important official dispatch which 
shall be sent to Authority, partners, customers. 
Provide legal consultancy in connection to all aspects of 
the Company operations 
Give legal advices to other departments in implementing the projects 
Register of the Company intellectual property and manage 
Intellectual Property certificates 
Register, amend and fill of the Company corporate registration certificate 
Manage all business certificates; 
Carry out to register and coordinate to third party in registration according 
to approval of Manager; 
Manage status of business registration of the company and 
suggest opinion to Legal Manager for approval. 
Ensure the legality of the Company operations in authorization 
and manage of authorization 
Receive, draft and review authorized letters to comply with regulations; 
Manage, keep and extract authorization system. 
Participate to the other Depts in solving conflicts. Being the duly 
authorized party of the Company in dealing with litigation 
and dispute settlement 
Receive, collect, analyse documents; judge circumstance and legal risk 
and suggest methods to protect Company’s rights; 
Represent Company according to assgined by CEO and coordinate 
to third party to carry out the case at competent authority; 
Carry out necessary procedures; 
Manage all documents, report and extract as requested. 
Update promply new regulations in order to ensure that legislations 
affect the Company operations to be indentified timely. 
Suport related departments in evaluate in influence of regulation trend 
Update legal documents relating to Company’s activities; 
Guide other Depts in applying new regulations; 
Manage law library according to request of Legal Manager 
Filing and managing legal documents within scope in respect 
of the Company’s regulations 
GOLDEN SUMMER FASHIONS CO., LTD 
Legal Specialist |  Apr 2017 –  Jun 2018 
MAISON RETAIL MANAGEMENT INTERNATIONAL CORPORATION 
Legal Assistant | Jul 2016 – Jan 2017 
PROCTER & GAMBLE VIETNAM 
Legal Assistant |Oct 2015 – Jun 2016 
THE PEOPLE’S COURT OF DISTRICT 1, HCMC 
Internship | Oct 2014 – Jun 2015 
WORK HISTORY 
18/09/1993 
LANGUAGES 
• Vietnamese 
• English 
, 
• Work independently and teamwork 
• Project coordinator 
• Work to tight deadlines 
• Negotiate effectively 
• Excellent communication and social skills 
• Adapt administrative and reporting skills 
• Work under pressure 
• Prioritize work 
• Meticulous 
QUALITIES 
BACHELOR OF LAWS (LLB) | 2011-2015 
THE UNIVERSITY OF ECONOMICS & LAW 
THE NATIONAL UNIVERSITY OF HCMC 
EDUCATION 
NGUYEN LE TU UYEN
